title: What happened with Incarnati0n?
body:
Hello everybody. At the beginning of season 5 I used to follow Incarnati0n. I watched his stream and even when he didn't stream I watched his games in the league client. He played with the Account Incarnati0n v2 but now it seems like he did a namechange because the Account Incarnati0n v2 is now in Platinum 1. Since he got Challenger with this Account after a few days it's impossible that's him. So I want to know: What happened with his Account? Does anyone know sth. about it?

:)
